CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The widely used rylene diimides include perylene diimides ( PDIs , 1 ) and naphthalene diimides ( NDIs , 2 ) ( Figure 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. Perylene diimides (PDIs)
2. Naphthalene diimides (NDIs)

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Perylene diimides (PDIs)
2. Naphthalene diimides (NDIs)

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material names. All other entities, such as "widely used," "include," "figures," and "numbers," are not material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Perylene diimides (PDIs) |
| Naphthalene diimides (NDIs) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The widely used rylene diimides include perylene diimides ( PDIs , 1 ) and naphthalene diimides ( NDIs , 2 ) ( Figure 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. rylene diimides
2. perylene diimides (PDIs)
3. naphthalene diimides (NDIs)

These are all compound names and can be considered as properties or types of diimides.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. rylene diimides (property type)
2. perylene diimides (PDIs) (material property)
3. naphthalene diimides (NDIs) (material property)

These entities refer to specific types or classes of material properties, in this case, diimides, and their subtypes, perylene diimides and naphthalene diimides.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| rylene diimides (property type) |
| perylene diimides (PDIs) (material property) |
| naphthalene diimides (NDIs) (material property) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The widely used rylene diimides include perylene diimides ( PDIs , 1 ) and naphthalene diimides ( NDIs , 2 ) ( Figure 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. rylene diimides
2. perylene diimides (PDIs)
3. naphthalene diimides (NDIs)

These are the property values mentioned in the paragraph. They are types of diimides, specifically rylene diimides, with two subtypes: perylene diimides and naphthalene diimides.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. perylene diimides (PDIs)
2. naphthalene diimides (NDIs)

These are the entities that refer to specific types of material properties, in this case, diimides, with perylene diimides and naphthalene diimides as subtypes.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| perylene diimides (PDIs) |
| naphthalene diimides (NDIs) |
